mapper.select: SELECT w.watering_id, w.myplant_id, p.member_id, p.name, w.date_at, w.check_flag, 'WATERING' type FROM watering w JOIN myplant p ON w.myplant_id = p.myplant_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.del_flag IS NULL AND w.date_at >= #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND w.date_at < #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY w.date_at ASC;

SELECT d.diary_id, d.myplant_id, p.member_id, p.name, d.memo, d.created_at, 'DIARY' type FROM diary d JOIN myplant p ON d.myplant_id = p.myplant_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} AND p.del_flag IS NULL AND d.created_at >= #{startDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND d.created_at < #{endDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY d.created_at ASC;
SELECT d.diary_id, d.myplant_id, mp.name, d.activity, d.state, d.memo, d.created_at FROM diary d JOIN myplant mp ON mp.myplant_id = d.myplant_id WHERE d.diary_id = #{diaryId}
SELECT myplant_id, NAME FROM myplant WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND del_flag IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (myplant_id,activity, state, memo, created_at) VALUES (#{myplantId},#{activity}, #{state}, #{memo},NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT mp.myplant_id, mp.start_at, mp.end_date, mp.`interval`, mp.member_id, mp.name FROM myplant mp WHERE mp.del_flag IS NULL AND mp.start_at IS NOT NULL AND mp.end_date IS NOT NULL AND mp.`interval` IS NOT NULL AND mp.start_at <= DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND mp.end_date >= NOW() LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO watering (myplant_id, date_at) VALUES (#{myplantId}, #{dateAt})
